text: Regine Chevallier () is a Haitian fashion designer. She has earned the title, "Hat Lady to the Stars" for her unique collection of "Haute Summer Hats". ==Biography== Chevallier is from Port-au-Prince, Haiti and maintains a fashion-house based in Miami. She draws on her European-Haitian heritage for influence for her designs; a melange of African, French and Italian. Chevallier is also a former Consulate General of the Republic of Haiti in Miami. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Haitian fashion designers Category:People from Port-au-Prince Category:People from Miami Category:Haitian women in business Category:Haitian people of French descent Category:Haitian people of Italian descent
title: Regine Chevallier
